oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Monitoring of organic hay meadows to provide feedback for public access, biodiversity, and crop management
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Williams, Leslie R
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pasture and forage crops
Knowledge management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper was presented at the UK organic Research 2002 conference of the Colloquium of Organic Researchers (COR). The use of monitoring to provide feedback into the decision making of a management plan for a farm and nature reserve is described.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Organic Centre Wales, Institute of Rural Studies, University of Wales Aberystwyth
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Williams, Leslie R (2002) Monitoring of organic hay meadows to provide feedback for public access, biodiversity, and crop management. In: Powell, Jane and et al., (Eds.) Proceedings of the UK Organic Research 2002 Conference, Organic Centre Wales, Institute of Rural Studies, University of Wales Aberystwyth, pp. 93-94.
